name: Eurostar E300 Standard Premier: 300km/h Brussels to London (in just 2 hours!)
description:
Get up to 50% OFF your subscription with Babbel and start learning a new language! https://babbel.me/paulstripreports

Eurostar is one of the most famous and most recognisable train services in the world. They're well known for their modern and fast fleet, but they still have some of the original Class 373/E300/TMST trains running on select services to Brussels and Paris. I took one in Standard Premier and covered my experience. Enjoy the video!

Follow me on Twitter: @paul_winginit ¬¶ https://twitter.com/paul_winginit

0:00 Intro
1:45 Arrival at Brussels-Midi and "check in"
2:06 Passport control experience
2:50 Boarding our Eurostar
4:21 Departure from Brussels-Midi
4:44 Babbel sponsored segment
6:15 Scenic views and seat review
7:20 Standard Premier meal
9:03 Entering the Channel Tunnel
10:11 Cafe-car and toilet 
11:22 Kent, England, out of the tunnel
12:36 Prices and how to book
13:37 Conclusions, thanks, and goodbye!
